languages.text: {n}Явный лидер компании, худощавый мужчина с желчным лицом, одет в цвета дома Зауэрбэк — это, несомненно, Махарий, глава рода. Он церемонно кланяется вам.{/n} "Поздравляю, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Явный лидер компании, худощавый мужчина с желчным лицом, одет в цвета дома Зауэрбек — это, несомненно, Махарий, глава рода. Он церемонно кланяется вам.{/n} "Поздравляю, Ваша милость".

languages.text: {n}The clear leader of this gathering is a gaunt, bilious-faced man dressed in Sauerback colours — this must be Macharius himself, head of the house. He offers you a ceremonious bow.{/n} "My congratulations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Явный лидер компании, худощавый мужчина с желчным лицом, одет в цвета дома Зауэрбэк — это, несомненно, Махарий, глава рода. Он церемонно кланяется вам.{/n} "Поздравляю, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}The clear leader of this gathering, a gaunt man with a bilious face, dressed in Sauerback colors, is, undoubtedly, Macharius himself, head of the house. He offers you a ceremonious bow.{/n} "My congratulations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}The clear leader of this gathering, a gaunt man with a bilious face, dressed in Sauerback colors, is, undoubtedly, Macharius himself, head of the house. He offers you a ceremonious bow.{/n} "My congratulations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}The clear leader of this gathering is a gaunt, bilious-faced man dressed in Sauerback colours — this must be Macharius himself, head of the house. He offers you a ceremonious bow.{/n} "My congratulations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}The clear leader of this gathering is a gaunt, bilious-faced man dressed in Sauerback colours — this must be Macharius himself, head of the house. He offers you a ceremonious bow.{/n} "My congratulations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}The clear leader of this gathering is a gaunt, bilious-faced man dressed in Sauerback colours — this must be Macharius himself, head of the house. He offers you a ceremonious bow.{/n} "My congratulations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}この集まりのリーダーは明らかに、ザウアーバックの色を身につけた、不機嫌そうな痩せた男、ザウアーバック家の当主、マハリウスその人に違いない。マハリウスは改まって一礼する。{/n}「おめでとうございます、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}The clear leader of this gathering is a gaunt, bilious-faced man dressed in Sauerback colours — this must be Macharius himself, head of the house. He offers you a ceremonious bow.{/n} "My congratulations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}この集まりのリーダーは明らかに、ザウアーバックの色を身につけた、不機嫌そうな痩せた男、ザウアーバック家の当主、マハリウスその人に違いない。マハリウスは改まって一礼する。{/n}「おめでとうございます、陛下」

languages.text: {n}这群贵族的领袖穿着苏尔贝克家族的衣服，这个人面容枯槁，满脸不悦。这个人肯定就是苏尔贝克家族的领袖，马卡里乌斯本人。他向您郑重地鞠了一躬。{/n}“祝贺您，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The clear leader of this gathering is a gaunt, bilious-faced man dressed in Sauerback colours — this must be Macharius himself, head of the house. He offers you a ceremonious bow.{/n} "My congratulations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}这群贵族的领袖穿着苏尔贝克家族的衣服，这个人面容枯槁，满脸不悦。这个人肯定就是苏尔贝克家族的领袖，马卡里乌斯本人。他向您郑重地鞠了一躬。{/n}“祝贺您，大人。”

languages.text: {n}El líder indiscutible de esta reunión es un hombre demacrado, de rostro bilioso, ataviado con los colores de los Sauerback. No debe de ser sino el propio Macharius, jefe de la casa. Te ofrece una ceremoniosa reverencia.{/n} «Enhorabuena, {mf|milord|milady}».
languages.original_text: {n}The clear leader of this gathering is a gaunt, bilious-faced man dressed in Sauerback colours — this must be Macharius himself, head of the house. He offers you a ceremonious bow.{/n} "My congratulations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El líder indiscutible de esta reunión es un hombre demacrado, de rostro bilioso, ataviado con los colores de los Sauerback. No debe de ser sino el propio Macharius, jefe de la casa. Te ofrece una ceremoniosa reverencia.{/n}"Enhorabuena, {mf|milord|milady}».

languages.text: {n}Celui qui semble être le chef de ce groupe est un individu émacié à l'air renfrogné, vêtu des couleurs des Sauerback. Il doit s'agir du dirigeant même de la maison, Macharius. Il s'incline avec cérémonie.{/n} « Mes félicitations, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The clear leader of this gathering is a gaunt, bilious-faced man dressed in Sauerback colours — this must be Macharius himself, head of the house. He offers you a ceremonious bow.{/n} "My congratulations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Celui qui semble être le chef de ce groupe est un individu émacié à l'air renfrogné, vêtu des couleurs des Sauerback. Il doit s'agir du dirigeant même de la maison, Macharius. Il s'incline avec cérémonie.{/n} « Mes félicitations, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Offensichtlicher Anführer dieser Gruppe ist ein hagerer Mann mit grünlichem Gesicht in Sauerback-Farben – das muss Macharius selbst sein, Oberhaupt des Hauses. Er verbeugt sich feierlich vor dir.{/n} "Meinen Glückwunsch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}The clear leader of this gathering is a gaunt, bilious-faced man dressed in Sauerback colours — this must be Macharius himself, head of the house. He offers you a ceremonious bow.{/n} "My congratulations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Offensichtlicher Anführer dieser Gruppe ist ein hagerer Mann mit grünlichem Gesicht in Sauerback-Farben – das muss Macharius selbst sein, Oberhaupt des Hauses. Er verbeugt sich feierlich vor dir.{/n} "Meinen Glückwunsch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Belli ki bu grubun lideri; Sauerback üniformalı, cılız, aksi suratlı bir adam. Adam, hanenin reisi Macharius olmalı. Macharius, son derece resmî bir şekilde eğilerek seni selamlıyor.{/n} "Tebriklerimi sunarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}The clear leader of this gathering is a gaunt, bilious-faced man dressed in Sauerback colours — this must be Macharius himself, head of the house. He offers you a ceremonious bow.{/n} "My congratulations, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Belli ki bu grubun lideri, Sauerback üniformalı cılız, aksi suratlı bir adam. Herhâlde bu adam, hanenin reisi Macharius olmalı. Macharius, son derece resmî bir şekilde eğilerek seni selamlıyor.{/n} "Tebriklerimi sunarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
